name: Tarot Battle: The Wheel of Fortune
name_original: Tarot Battle: The Wheel of Fortune
description: Tarot Battle: The Wheel of Fortune, a 2-4 player tabletop card game that allows players to use tarot cards fighting each other, while developing strategies based on the different rules of different realms on the board. The game uses nonlinear random progression, players can build a different board and play different rules in each game.
